javadoc:
An interface to signal that the implementing action works with an individual Java 
 {@link Component}.   Standard Docking Actions are either global tool-based actions or local 
 {@link ComponentProvider} actions.   This interface allows us to have the concept of an 
 action that is effectively local to a specific Java component.

methods.name: isValidComponentContext
methods.comment: Returns true if the given context contains this action's component

return.comment: true if the given context contains this action's component

name: ComponentBasedDockingAction
comment:
An interface to signal that the implementing action works with an individual Java 
 Component.   Standard Docking Actions are either global tool-based actions or local 
 ComponentProvider actions.   This interface allows us to have the concept of an 
 action that is effectively local to a specific Java component.
